sentences.en: {"COLLOINEXA":["road signs"]}
sentences.cn: 路标

sentences.en: a minus sign
sentences.cn: 减号

sentences.en: a no smoking sign
sentences.cn: 禁止吸烟的告示牌

sentences.en: A paw print in the dust was a sign that a tiger was close.
sentences.cn: 沙土里的一个爪印表明附近有老虎。

sentences.en: a sign on the door
sentences.cn: 门上的标牌

sentences.en: a signed photo of Paul McCartney
sentences.cn: 一张保罗·麦卡特尼的签名照片

sentences.en: CBS Records had signed her back in 1988 on a three-album contract.
sentences.cn: 哥伦比亚唱片公司早在 1988 年就和她签订了发行三张专辑的合同。

sentences.en: Don’t ignore the fog warning signs .
sentences.cn: 不要忽视雾警标志。

sentences.en: Equations are generally written with a two-bar equals sign.
sentences.cn: 等式通常用两道横的等号来表示。

sentences.en: Go straight through that door under the EXIT sign.
sentences.cn: 从“安全出口”标志下的那道门直穿过去。

sentences.en: got the Congress to sign off on the tax proposal.
sentences.cn: 使国会正式同意这项税务提案

sentences.en: He has posted a sign up that says "No Fishing"
sentences.cn: 他已经张贴了一张“禁止钓鱼”的告示牌。

sentences.en: He would sign off each week with the catch-phrase, "I'llsee thee!"
sentences.cn: 每周结束节目时他都会说那句经典的话，“下周见！”。

sentences.en: Her son used sign language to tell her what happened.
sentences.cn: 她儿子用手语告诉她发生了什么事。

sentences.en: I had to sign on the dole on Monday.
sentences.cn: 我只好于星期一办理了领取失业救济金的登记。

sentences.en: I have no intention of signing away my inheritance.
sentences.cn: 我无意签字放弃继承权。

sentences.en: I signed out the keys.
sentences.cn: 我登记将钥匙借出。

sentences.en: it was hard to get celebrities to sign off on those issues.
sentences.cn: 很难得到名流对这些问题的认同。

sentences.en: Many people felt that admitting to stress was a sign of weakness.
sentences.cn: 许多人认为承认有压力是意志薄弱的表现。

sentences.en: Mark was lying unconscious but with no outward sign of injury.
sentences.cn: 马克躺在那儿昏迷不醒，但看不出受伤的迹象。

sentences.en: O.K. I'll sign off. We'll talk at the beginning of the week.
sentences.cn: 好，就说到这儿吧，下周初我们再谈。

sentences.en: Over a hundred people have sign ed the petition .
sentences.cn: 已有一百多人在请愿书上签了名。

sentences.en: road signs
sentences.cn: 路标

sentences.en: Serena sign s her autograph every time she’s asked.
sentences.cn: 每次有人请塞雷娜签名她都会签。

sentences.en: She checked the hall, then gave the others a thumbs-up sign.
sentences.cn: 她查看了一下大厅，然后冲其他人竖了一下大拇指。

sentences.en: Sign here, please.
sentences.cn: 请在这里签字。

sentences.en: Some sign languages are very sophisticated means of communication.
sentences.cn: 有些手语可以表达非常复杂的内容。

sentences.en: The artist had signed his name in the corner of the painting.
sentences.cn: 画家在画的角上落了款。

sentences.en: the dollar sign
sentences.cn: 美元符号

sentences.en: The priest made the sign of the cross over him.
sentences.cn: 神父在他上方画了个十字。

sentences.en: The sign on the bus read "Private: Not In Service".
sentences.cn: 巴士的标牌上写着“私家车：不对外出租”。

sentences.en: the theft was a sign of the times.
sentences.cn: 偷窃是这个时代的标志。

sentences.en: the thumbs-up sign (= a sign that you make with your hand to show that something is successful )
sentences.cn: 〔示意成功的〕翘拇指手势

sentences.en: There were no signs of forced entry into the house.
sentences.cn: 没有强行入室的痕迹。

sentences.en: There's some question as to whether he will sign this resolution.
sentences.cn: 他是否会签署这项决议还不能确定。

sentences.en: They are willing to sign away their entire worldly possessions.
sentences.cn: 他们愿意签字放弃所有财产。

sentences.en: You forgot to sign the cheque .
sentences.cn: 你忘记在支票上签名了。

words.tran_cn: 有符号的；已签字的；有正负之分的
署名；写下；预示；示意（sign的过去分词）
有重要性；要紧；冒充内行
使…显著；用信号通知；庆祝；突出地表明
使显眼；使著名；向…发信号

phrases.tran_cn: 签订合同；签合同；签署合同
签到：通过在签名记录（另一个人或者是自己的）到达
时代的标志（尤指不受欢迎或讨厌的事物）
星座老虎机；[天]黄道十二宫
【非正式用语】 正式同意：正式或结论性地表示同意
签名登记离开；用签名记录离开的时间
登记某人（尤指因病）不宜工作
签字放行；登记某人的离开
（在契约上）签字放弃（权利，财产）

phrases.phrase: signed, sealed, and delivered (或 signed and sealed

phrases.tran_cn: 停车标志；停止信号/标志

trans.tran_en: a piece of paper, metal, or wood with words or a picture that gives people information, warnings, or instructions
to write your  signature  on something to show that you wrote it, agree with it, or were present
